other_title: Cronache di guerra di Alessandro il Grande (Italian)
plot: Prince Alexander, son of King Philip, and heir to the Macedonian empire, must fend off political sabotuers, assassins, and the jealousy of his own father to ascend to the position of king. Once there, he begins his quest to conquer all nations and become known as the Great King, though an ancient prophecy fortells that he will be the destroyer of the world and forever remembered as the Devil King.
opening_theme: "Anata no Kiss wo Oshiemasho ~You Were Mine~" by Yuki Koyanagi [Japanese version]
"Worthy of Your Soul" by DJ Milky and b-nCHANt-d featuring Rachel Pollack [U.S. version]
